trans-unit.source: Defines an interface that allows the [Vbc](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3) task to communicate with the host integrated development environment (IDE).
trans-unit.target: 定义一个接口，它使 [Vbc](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3) 任务可以与主机集成开发环境 (IDE) 进行通信。

trans-unit.source: This interface allows the `Vbc` task to delegate project compilation to the IDE rather than using command line compilers.
trans-unit.target: 此接口允许`Vbc`任务去委派给 IDE，而无需使用命令行编译器的项目编译。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 开始 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject" /> 的初始化。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the project.
trans-unit.target: 编译该项目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.IVbcHostObject" /> 的初始化已结束。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the integrated development environment (IDE) is currently in design time mode.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示集成开发环境 (IDE) 当前是否处于设计时模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the IDE is currently in design time mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IDE 当前处于设计时模式下，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the compiled project is up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，它指示编译后的项目是否为最新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the compiled project is up-to-date; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已编译的项目是最新的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of directories to search for references.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中搜索引用的目录的数组。

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional directories to search for references.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在其中搜索引用的其他目录。

trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of modules to be part of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 将构成程序集一部分的模块的数组。

trans-unit.target: 指定将构成程序集一部分的一个或多个模块。

trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 输出文件的文件格式。

trans-unit.target: 该值可以是 <see langword="library" />、<see langword="exe" />、<see langword="module" /> 或 <see langword="winexe" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The file format of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 输出文件的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="library" />, <see langword="exe" />, <see langword="module" />, or <see langword="winexe" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以是 <see langword="library" />、<see langword="exe" />、<see langword="module" /> 或 <see langword="winexe" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the file format of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 指定输出文件的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to treat all warnings as errors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要将所有警告视为错误，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a value indicating whether to treat all warnings as errors.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个值，该值指示是否将所有警告视为错误。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A list of warnings to treat as errors.
trans-unit.target: 将被视为错误的警告的列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of warnings to treat as errors.
trans-unit.target: 指定将被视为错误的警告的列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A list of warnings that are not treated as errors.
trans-unit.target: 不被视为错误的警告的列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of warnings that are not treated as errors.
trans-unit.target: 指定不被视为错误的警告的列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The .ico file to insert into the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 要插入到程序集的 .ico 文件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an .ico file to insert into the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定要插入到程序集的 .ico 文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A Win32 resource (.res) file to insert into the output file.
trans-unit.target: 要插入输出文件的 Win32 资源 (.res) 文件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a Win32 resource (.res) file to insert into the output file.
trans-unit.target: 指定要插入输出文件的 Win32 资源 (.res) 文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the method was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
